title: Removing Bans of Picked Players
body: I'm getting tired of seeing people banning pre-picks just to mess with players. Take this nonsense out of the game so trolls stop taking advantage of it. Either make it so they can't be banned if they're picking them or remove the option to show people who you plan to pick.

replies.body: So, if you were able to block bans by pre-picking someone, could that not be used to troll even worse?

So, let's say there's a champ that's **super** OP right now and Riot is waiting until the next patch to fix them. They're pick/ban in ranked. As in, there's a 75% chance you lose if the enemy picks them. Enemy team has first pick. You want to ban this champ, but wait, your 5th pick player has chosen the champ because "i want to play them" (but in reality they're just trolling you and using that as their excuse so they don't get caught doing it).

Yes, this is an extreme, but pick/ban champs happen all the time.
No, if I want to ban a high contest pick I should be able to ban a high contest pick.
That would remove quite a bit of agency from the ban phase, which is why 5-ban was given in the first place. To give everyone a say.
Was the point to give people a choice to ban someone you pre-pick or was that a side effect?

> Was the point to give people a choice to ban someone you pre-pick or was that a side effect?

I can almost guarantee that 95% of the time people aren't banning something to be mean to you. They have a desired effect in mind for how they want the game to go in their favour.

( Otherwise I'd be banning out a lot of my junglers champions just because I dont like how they play atm. Kindred, Nidalee, etc.)
The only troll is a person who is dumb enough to take Player Behavior department serious. Watch this get censored.

Why would it be censored? It doesn't violate any rules. 

This sub board is still a community thing, not player support.
